data.title: How to Read the Dune Books in Order
data.meta_description: Discover the correct reading order for Frank Herbertâ€™s iconic works and learn why Dune is one of the bestselling science fiction books ever published.
data.text:
Explore the Golden Age of science fiction.

Frank Herbert. Arthur Clark. Robert Heinlein. Explore works by them and more illustrious science fiction writers in this collection, curated by our team.

Read them before you watch them.

These science fiction and fantasy books have all been adapted into TV shows and movies. Check out these books before you watch the adaptations.
